text: Morris "Mort" Drucker (March 22, 1929 â€“ April 9, 2020) was an American caricaturist and comics artist. He worked for Mad magazine for over 50 years. At Mad, he became known for his satires on leading feature movies and television series. Drucker was born in Brooklyn, New York City, to a Jewish family. Some sources list his birth date as March 22, 1929, and others as March 29. He died on April 9, 2020 in Woodbury, New York, at the age of 91. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1929 births Category:2020 deaths Category:American cartoonists Category:American comics artists Category:American Jews Category:People from Brooklyn
title: Mort Drucker
